{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3528011,"name":"Murilo Miranda Santos","username":"murilo404","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-15T17:22:00.165Z","cooked":"

good morning! i did this code for my limelight 3g. is correct?

package frc.robot;

import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.TimedRobot;
import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableInstance;
import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableInstance;

public class Robot extends TimedRobot{

NetworkTable limelight = NetworkTableInstance.getDefault().getTable(“limelight”);
boolean hasTarget;
double tagId;

@Override
public void teleopPeriodic(){
hasTarget = limelight.getEntry(“tv”).getDouble(0) == 1;
tagId = limelight.getEntry(“tid”).getDouble(-1);

if(hasTarget){
  executeBaseActionOnId(tagId);
}

}
private void executeBaseActionOnId(double tagId){
switch ((int) tagId) {
case 1:
System.out.print(“executando ação 1”);
break;
case 2:
System.out.print(“executando ação 2”);
break;
default:
System.out.print(“nenhuma foi executada”);
break;
}
}
}
